name: Covid Nukem
description:
Project for 2020 "Team Programming Workshop"

A deadly virus is spreading throughout the world. Nuclear warheads are the only solutions. Stop the virus while avoiding any collateral damage.
The survival of the human race is in your hands.

Credits:

  • Adam Jasiołek (algorithm design)
  • Jarosław Kilian (sound & graphics design)
  • Mateusz Kagan (user interface)

GitHub repository
